summary: Claire and Pierre are nice civilised, slightly elderly people, living in their nice pool-lined-villa in their nice neighbourhood. Claire is a lifelong housewife, Pierre is a fin-de-carrière... See full summary »
cast: Ruud De Ridder|Nicole Laurent|Sven De Ridder|Anke Frederick|Marijn De Valck|R. Kan Albay|Goedele Liekens|Luc Verhoeven|Gert Verhulst|Daniel Vidovsky|Myriam Vischschoonmaker|Aron Wade
title: Bingo
